short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connecting people through websites. Chat, follow, see user actions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you install onyanet you can interact with other onyanet users.
- chat with others on the same domain
- see other users actions on the same page (in development)
- follow another onyanet user in their navigation if the user enables it (in development)
